code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useLocation,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{QRCodeCanvas}from'qrcode.react';import'./QRGenerationPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QRGenerationPage=()=>{const location=useLocation();const navigate=useNavigate();const{tools,businessName}=location.state||{};const[websiteLink,setWebsiteLink]=useState('');const handleLinkSubmit=()=>{if(websiteLink.trim()){navigate('/website-link-qr',{state:{tools,businessName,websiteLink}});}};const handleBack=()=>{navigate('/with-ai');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"qr-generation-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"welcome-message",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Website Link for QR Code"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["for ",businessName]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"link-input-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter website link",value:websiteLink,onChange:e=>setWebsiteLink(e.target.value),className:"website-link-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLinkSubmit,disabled:!websiteLink.trim(),className:"submit-link-button",children:"Generate QR Code"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"action-buttons",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleBack,className:"back-button",children:"Back to Tool Selection"})})]});};export default QRGenerationPage;
